title: Patch 6.15 - Game crashes mid game (MAC)
body:
So i play league on my 2010 Mac book pro, and up until recently i have had no problems whatsoever. But now since the 6.15 update, my games have been crashing each and every time mid game, it is frustrating, i have done everything i can, repaired the system, reinstalled the game 2 times already and many more. I'm not completely blaming the game, it might be my mac book itself that is the problem but when i do anything else, this never happens.

And it is not bug splat or anything else, the game starts normally; go in the character select and wait for it to load. A few minutes everything is completely fine but suddenly the screen freezes and im unable to log off or do anything and my laptop turns off by itself in a few seconds.

Any suggestions at all???

replies.body:
From your description, it sounds like your Macbook may be experiencing hardware issues. The guide that *Rineyy* linked is a great place to start, specifically with the NVRAM and SMC resets, as those two steps can reset and resolve a lot of BIOS-level issues with your hardware. 

Let me know if you continue to have issues after working through that Bugsplat&Crash guide.
I have the excact same problem, but then with a windows 8.1 pc.
Have you performed the steps in [this article?](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/a41MGWd8-patch-615-game-crashes-mid-game-mac?comment=0000)
I have tried it, restarted pc after it. it is still happening.
Have you installed the latest Windows updates?
i will try it, ill comment later if it worked
